data.Title: Google Confirms Core Updates Impact AI Overviews
data.Description: Google's John Mueller has confirmed that core updates impact the search engine's AI-powered overviews, providing insights for website owners and SEOs.

data.Title: Baidu Blocks Google and Bing From Scraping Content
data.Description: Baidu Baike, a Wikipedia-style service, has barred Google and Bing's search engine crawlers from indexing its content, raising concerns about data access for AI projects.

data.Title: Perplexity to Introduce AI Search Ads with CPM Model
data.Description: AI search startup Perplexity plans to launch ads in Q4 2024, utilizing a CPM model with prices starting at $50. Advertisers will have the opportunity to sponsor "related questions" within search results.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update: Gains Vanishing, Impact Assessment
data.Description: Google's August 2024 core update, released on August 15th, was followed by a ranking bug, causing confusion among SEOs. Google advises waiting until the update is fully rolled out before assessing its impact.

data.Title: Bing Image Search Introduces Refinement Cards
data.Description: Bing Image Search now features refinement cards within its results interface, offering users refined search options with example photos for a more targeted search experience.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Migration in September
data.Description: Google will migrate all merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September, introducing changes to the platform's interface and features.

data.Title: Reddit's Advertising Strategy: Interest-Based Targeting and Projected Revenue
data.Description: Reddit is leveraging its vast network of subreddits for interest-based targeting, attracting advertisers and projecting ad revenue to exceed $1.1 billion in 2024.

data.Title: YouTube Emerges as Top Podcast Listening Platform in the US
data.Description: A Cumulus Media study reveals that YouTube is the most popular platform for podcast listening in the US, surpassing Spotify and Apple Podcasts.

data.Title: Bing Image Creator Adds Square-to-Landscape Image Resizing
data.Description: Microsoft Bing Image Creator now allows users to easily resize AI-generated images from square to landscape format, enhancing the tool's versatility.

data.Title: Google Disputes Common SEO Audit Advice
data.Description: Google has questioned the validity of certain SEO audit recommendations provided by automated tools, urging website owners to exercise caution and prioritize manual review.

data.Title: Google Antitrust Ruling Sparks Debate on AI Content Use
data.Description: A recent antitrust ruling against Google has ignited debate among online publishers and SEO experts regarding the use of their content for AI-generated search results.
